text: Homoromanticism is a romantic orientation. A homoromantic person is most likely to have romantic relationship with a person of the same gender or sex. Homoromantic people can have any sexual orientation. The term homoromantic is useful for asexual people to express their affection. Some homoromantic people may also identify as lesbian or gay man. The term was created in on-line communities, such as Asexual Visibility and Education Network. == References == Category:Romantic orientation Category:LGBT identities
title: Homoromanticism
